Body:
instance = HostBase()
for ipv, ipb, srcip, dstip, ip_flags in ((4, 'ip', ipaddress.ip_address(
    '192.168.0.1'), ipaddress.ip_address('192.168.0.2'), (1, 0)), (6,
    'ipv6', ipaddress.ip_address('fc01::1'), ipaddress.ip_address('fc01::2'
    ), (1, 0)), (4, 'ip', ipaddress.ip_address('192.168.0.1'), ipaddress.
    ip_address('8.8.8.8'), (0, 0)), (6, 'ipv6', ipaddress.ip_address(
    'fc01::1'), ipaddress.ip_address('2001:4860:4860::8888'), (0, 0)), (4,
    'ip', ipaddress.ip_address('192.168.0.1'), ipaddress.ip_address(
    '224.0.0.1'), (0, 1))):
    row = nan_row_dict({'ip.version': ipv, ('%s.src' % ipb): str(int(srcip)
        ), ('%s.dst' % ipb): str(int(dstip))})
    assert instance._get_src_ip(row) == srcip
    assert instance._get_dst_ip(row) == dstip
    assert instance._df_ip_flags(srcip, dstip) == ip_flags
